title: Improve search configuration and metadata
description: Configure MkDocs search plugin for better discoverability. Add page-specific keywords, optimize heading structure for search indexing, configure search.suggest and search.highlight (already enabled). Review search separator config (mkdocs.yml:79). Add meta tags to key pages. Test search accuracy for common queries (TUI, CLI, SDK, features). Reference .local/mkdocs-material search configuration. Story Points: 2. Dependencies: SOUL-175 (Navigation affects search structure).

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Completed search configuration improvements:

✅ Added inline documentation to mkdocs.yml explaining search separator regex
✅ Added YAML frontmatter metadata to 9 key documentation pages:
   - TUI overview and features
   - CLI reference and chat mode
   - SDK overview and tools guide
   - Quick start and getting started
✅ Configured search boost values (SDK: 1.15, Quickstart: 1.2, TUI/CLI: 1.1)
✅ Tested search queries - all common terms return relevant results:
   - TUI: 107 matches
   - CLI: 75 matches
   - SDK: 42 matches
   - tools: 318 matches
   - chat: 158 matches

Search separator correctly tokenizes technical terms (TUI, CLI, SDK) and handles camelCase.
All 1,305 docs indexed successfully in 603KB search index.
